## API & Developer Platform

**Phase:** Phase 5 - Advanced Integration & Ecosystem
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 5.4

### Goal
Expand integration ecosystem and platform capabilities

### Impact
Enables third-party integrations

### Effort Estimate
2 weeks

### Priority
